Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The 185delAG BRCA1 mutation originated before the dispersion of Jews in the diaspora and is not limited to Ashkenazim .

Let's think step by step.

Sure, I can help you with that! Here are the "Disease" entities identified in the paragraph:

| Disease |
| --- |
| BRCA1 mutation |
| 185delAG BRCA1 mutation |
| Ashkenazim |

Note that the entities are presented precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Of course! Here are the valid "Disease" entities identified in the paragraph:

The other entities in the paragraph (e.g. "Ashkenazim") do not clearly refer to a disease, so they have been excluded from the table.
